data.text:
@CatharineMc @cstqcg @CTVNews Actually that is not true, as these guys say, make sure you listen to the end. This is hilarious.
https://t.co/bYjeCixFM8
@CTVNews Im surprised so many people are unvaccinated there, especially older more vulnerable people.

@CTVNews Even if the whole population is vaccinated, it is still useless when people can’t get an effective choice. Sadly, due to obvious political reasons, Hong Kong govt won’t explicitly tell people that the China Sinovac one is ineffective. It’s always politics first in new Hong Kong. https://t.co/76sATqwtzo

@peterdimov @CTVNews filling up the emergency intake rooms with people who have a runny nose. or a moderate fever. its causing chaos because people are unwilling to see the omicron strain for what it is -- a severe cold in majority of people, very dangerous to the unvaccinated.

@CTVNews Omicron breached Hong Kong’s defenses and has been spreading rapidly overflowing hospitals and isolation wards and prompting measures to test the entire 7.4 million population and hastily build six isolation and treatment centers
@SimRelic @cstqcg @CTVNews It never could and wasn’t intended to
@CTVNews Yup, they are now finding out that covid zero does not work. It just delays the inevitable.

@cstqcg @CTVNews I dont agree with your logic, but your entitled to your opinion. 
https://t.co/VB7pLPr1U1

@CTVNews Will this never end? 2 + 1 = safely vaccinated = 3 jabs, were à masque in indoor activities: all stores, schools etc.. life is too short to not do the right thing for your family and friends, save a life or a long covid disease
